message.body: im looking to start off small and go from there. theres a few short trips that seem ok, dont pay as much but also could do in a day and not much fuel
could make a nice weekend trip with that
I think there is more profit on the short trips
the cost one way would be like 20 bucks in gas
I don't know how much in tolls
although he said 140 was too high
so if its like 120, you make about 50 bucks if you don't do any other loads
40 in gas and 30 in tolls
the short trips would be good just to get the hang of it, then plan some longer trips with more cargo
yeah, sounds like a good plan
I also think that this life coaching thing can be done now
All you have to do is help people set realistic goals and meet with them once a week or less often and hold them accountable
i dont think its that simple but I would def like to look into it. just need to get my own life in order somewhat first
haha
Well, yeah I'm going to find out tomorrow how much that matters
I'm going to help some guy set some goals to get his life in order
I'm doing it for free though
its good practice, and very altruistic, but down the road id like to be legit and have some regular paying clients
yeah, no doubt, maybe if I'm good enough this guy will start paying me
performance based pay
oh I did get a tutoring job, its small, like a hundred a month right now
helping my mom's friend's son with math
every little bit helps
yeah! That should make me feel a little more comfortable
Could probably afford to pay like 250 for rent once I get that and then do work as well, I guess thats still not really enough yet
bc then I've got food and utilities
hmmm

I was thinking $300/mo all inclusive but I would expect you to buy some food as well. Fortunately you could work off some of it, but at this point I need money more than anything. That could change as things move forward
oh and one thing I did want to mention was I would like to get internet service here under your name, but that wouldnt affect the price
yeah, that wouldn't be too bad at all
I do have a membership to BJs
so, that should be a pretty good discount on food
one good thing is I always have stuff to do around here but its not really anything that needs to be done right away so you can have plenty of lazy days
haha
alright! Sounds pretty good!
well i dont know how long Im going to last at this place but im trying to get a few weeks in to make some cash. let me know if youre around tomorrow and we can try and get some work done on the room
oh, you're not working tomorrow?
no, i am I mean once Im done
oh, ok
got the new sump pump in so I feel better about moving stuff downstairs to clear that room out
ok cool, I'll let you know about tomorrow
but I may be busy most of the evening
aight I gots to get to bed, up at 6:30 again tomorrow, ugh
ugh
later
cya
